p: The crystal structure of M pro was uploaded in the Computed Atlas for Surface Topography of Proteins (CASTp) server to predict the active sites of protein. The following active sites were predicted from the pocket 1: THR24, THR25, THR26, LEU27, HIS41, CYS44, THR45, THR45, SER46, MET49, PRO52, TYR54, PHE140, LEU141, ASN142, GLY143, SER144, CYS145, HIS163, HIS164, MET165, GLU166, LEU167, PRO168, HIS172, ASP187, ARG188, GLN189, THR190, and GLN192.
